value.title: How to create STUNNING multicards in Power BI with a little bit of DAX
value.excerpt: In this video I am going to show you how, with a little bit of DAX, you can create stunning multicards. value.title: How to do Pagination on a REST API in Power Query (Part 1)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how to implement pagination when the number of pages or records to be returned are known.   Chapters: 00:00 Intro 00:30 Not all APIs have the same structure 01:10 Get data from World Bank API 01:45 How pagination works on the API 02:30 Hardcode the number of pages

value.title: How to fix the "Too many elements in the enumeration to complete..." pivot error in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever got the error: Expression.Error: There were too many elements in the enumeration to complete the operation.  when pivoting tables in Power Query?  In today's video I will show you why you get the error and two ways to fix it.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too. value.title: Display selected value from slicer to Power BI Report
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a situation where we need to display the selected slicer value in the title of our Power BI visualization. value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI.
